rComments: Dr. Bain is a great professor, however, she is a very tough marker. I've taken 3 courses with Dr. Bain, but her marking in this one was, by far, the hardest. I probably spent the most time on this course and got the lowest grade out of all my courses that semester.
teacherRatingTags: ['Tough grader', 'Get ready to read', 'Graded by few things']

rComments: Beverly is my favourite prof by far. she's so funny and approachable. EASIEST MARKER I'VE EVER HAD. As long as you go to class, you'll do exceptional on her tests as she gives you a summary of the readings she tests you on. You don't have to do the readings yourself if you attend lecture. would HIGHLY recommend taking literally any class with her.
She is rude, but she's okay.

Lectures are boring and useless as she reads off the powerpoint slides that will be posted onto blackboard. Very scatter brain and rambles on about her life. She is hilarious for sure, and knowledgeable about the material. If you like to watch videos to support what you are learning then you will like her as a professor!

I had high hopes for taking her course as I was/am very interested in women and trans people rights. However, Professor Bain was extremely disrespectful to me and I felt like she only wanted students to agree with her narrative of the world. I would not recommend her classes.

Very helpful prof, easy marker, course very interesting and she is very approachable and friendly. I liked the discussion based classroom atmosphere and she was very accommodating to students. Take this course for very applicable information and a good grade!
